website_summaries.verdict: Low price compared to other mobile scanners. Doesn't offer a battery, so must always connect to power.
pros: Runs both single- and double-sided pages
Can scan each page into its own file or multiple pages into one file
Reasonable scan quality considering the low price
cons: No battery power, so must be connected to a computer when running

website_summaries.verdict: With its ability to scan both sides of a document, the Brother DSmobile 720D is a bit more capable than most portable manual-feed scanners.
pros: Comes with capable document management software
cons: Although it comes with business card software, it doesn't handle business cards well

customer_reviews.title: Software from 1990
customer_reviews.text: OMG, I should have known better than to buy a Brother product. They should be called "Oh Brother"! I had a Brother printer once and it was horrible. This product is completely out of date. The software is a joke. You have to install several different apps to make this thing work...if you ever do. I couldn't. After 90 minutes of trying to figure out where my documents were going (after choosing a folder on my drive) I still couldn't find them. My rule is simple...on products like this, if they aren't easy to operate they go straight back. This is one of them. :(
customer_reviews.author: Douglas 007

customer_reviews.title: No full duplex in Windows 10
customer_reviews.text: Can not get it to scan in full duplex. Contacted Brother and they never got back to me. People state it works in Windows 10 but Brother site does not state that. The manual does not say one word about duplex. And can not find any place in B-R Receipts for adjusting duplex. Any help would be appreciated!
customer_reviews.author: GB

customer_reviews.title: Scanner software lacks a lot of necessary features
customer_reviews.text: I already have a scanning app on my mobile and it works well, but the amount of paper to scan increased, that why I bought this scanner. from HW point of view, I have no problem with this scanner, my problem is with the scanning software that comes with it. I can not crop the scanned image, no enhancement of what is ever. just simple scan and save. also, the size of the scanned file is huge and no optimization if you want to send as email. my mobile scanning app has rich features after the scan, why brother can not have with their product??
customer_reviews.author: OceanWavezz

customer_reviews.title: Best purchase all year- Computer graphics teacher.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my students and it was the best purchase I made all year. It was very easy to set up with my computer, and creates flawless documents. I also love all of the options. I was able to make digital copies of our workbook in black and white, even though the actual paper is tan. It also lets you save it as pdf or jpeg. I love the fact that it's portable and never in the way. This is so incredibly handy!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy to set up and use!
customer_reviews.text: There's not much to say other than it was very easy to set up and use. I bought this about 6 months ago and I've already used it several times to scan some important documents and some pictures. There is a bit of trial and error to get the picture quality and final output I was looking for, but that was really easy to mess around with. Storing this scanner is also a breeze. I haven't had any problems so far so I haven't had the need to contact tech support so I can't give any feedback (negative or positive) regarding that.
customer_reviews.author: sanvicente

customer_reviews.title: PaperPort will not install
customer_reviews.text: Buyer beware. I chose this scanner because, among other reasons, the description says it comes with PaperPort pdf editing software, which is on the installation disc, but will not install. When I contacted Brother customer service, they told me that PaperPort is not compatible with this scanner (even though it's advertised as included on Amazon and on the Brother website and is included on the setup disc and referenced in the manual).
customer_reviews.author: Benjamin R. Keck

customer_reviews.title: I'm rarely this harsh: HAVE A MAC? DON'T BUY THIS
customer_reviews.text: Purchased in Dec 2018. -Application is confusing - Has a save button that does nothing -Apparently created their own type of file format MPDF which stands for multiple pdf. odd -Updated the application without notifying customers. Mac version had no button to manually update. After an hour on the phone with customer service I figured out the solution: Uninstall and re download application -Had trouble using the unintuitive application EVERY time i used it. I own a software company and the app is honestly shameful. -All this said, the woman from South America who spent an hour on the line with me...the most recent time, was frickin great! Had she been nearby I'd have bought her a beer!
customer_reviews.author: Mike Petree

customer_reviews.title: A nice little scanner
customer_reviews.text: It is pretty much plug and scan... It is a perfect add on if your printer does not do duplex scanning. Very easy setup and quality is pretty good. Very sleek look but I would recommend buying a case for it as it could easily slip off a desk as it is pretty lightweight and to keep dust and debris out of the opening. Quality USB connection cord. I like Brother printers and scanners as they are durable and generally low maintenance and easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Fair Stevens

customer_reviews.title: Suprisingly Nice
customer_reviews.text: This little scanner is amazing. The software is simple and minimal. It plugs right into your USB without the need for an additional power source and starts working right away. I was scanning a license with a word document open and amazingly, without the intended purpose it scanned the image right into my document. I have always been a fan of brother products since first using them in the military.
customer_reviews.author: Proud Papa

customer_reviews.title: If you've got a Mac, look for a different scanner!
customer_reviews.text: A very problematic purchase. Despite a lot of troubleshooting, it still does not work with my iMac running 10.15.5. Always get "initialize failed" error when I try to open the ds720MobileCapture, and my iMac says there's a driver missing (not included on CD or in downloaded installation software?) so I can't even use it with other software (like Paperless). I did manage to get it to work on my Windows 10 laptop, but with difficulty. I won't go into the image quality or the inability to scan long documents/receipts because there are already reviews mentioning those problems.
customer_reviews.author: mafitts

customer_reviews.title: Software drivers do not work on Mac
customer_reviews.text: It was nice that they had the OS version to select from to confirm I was downloading the right drivers, but the drivers would not initialize and this scanner was DOA. It was light and looked pretty awesome, but it did not work even once on my MacBook Pro. OS 10.14
customer_reviews.author: Rapcat

customer_reviews.title: More difficult than it needs to be... (Mac OS)
customer_reviews.text: I ended up returning the product due to the software installation process. Tried to install the drivers per the online instructions without avail, a product such as this should be easier to connect without having to go through such installation hoops. The hardware looks solid, but without the software the product is useless and does not scan.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan

customer_reviews.title: Brother Scanner
customer_reviews.text: Initially the scanner was great.I used it once and all worked fine. I upgraded my software on my MacBook to Catalina and now the product doesn't work. I need to find out who to speak with to resolve the issue. Otherwise it's a wast of money.
customer_reviews.author: Weebaby

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and great quality!
customer_reviews.text: I am so relieved that this scanner works so well! I ordered a different brand first and returned it because it never worked properly. I hesitated to try another one online but I couldn't be happier! I am not very tech savvy but it was easy to download the software. I just plugged it in, opened the icon on my desktop, pressed scan ....and it worked! It scanned my photos quickly, and right to my file on my desktop! Organizing my last 30 years of photos is going to not be such a difficult project afterall. Thank you 'Brother'!
customer_reviews.author: Bree

customer_reviews.title: FANTASTIC scanner
customer_reviews.text: I looked everywhere before I bought this scanner for our small business. It got high reviews so I thought I would give it a try. It is so easy to install and use, it is amazing. The clarity of the scans is very good, and it scans simply and easily to whatever folder you specify on your computer. I seriously could not ask for a better scanner than this.
customer_reviews.author: Gina

customer_reviews.title: EXCELLENT EXCELLENT just plain EXCELLENT
customer_reviews.text: Another great buy from Amazon. This product works better than I thought anything that portable could. If you need to scan any type of document this is a must have. Since I have purchased this product my piles of paper have disappeared. Setup and use is a breeze. The images are professional quality and scan speeds are really fast. I just can say enough good things.
customer_reviews.author: George

customer_reviews.title: and good for on-the-road work or quick scans of receipts and ...
customer_reviews.text: The software is a bit clunky, and has a tendency to save an extra blank page when I click done. The quality is acceptable, and good for on-the-road work or quick scans of receipts and other records. But for the money I was hoping for something better. If you really need quality copies, you still probably need a flat bed scanner.
customer_reviews.author: Ben

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy if upgrading to MacOS Catalina
customer_reviews.text: The software included does not work with Catalina and there is no update or substitute provided by Brother. Very disappointing as it worked fine before the upgrade and now is a paperweight. Correction: there is an update to the software but it is much less capable than the original. The scanner is not visible to Image Capture in MacOS Catalina either.
customer_reviews.author: Dave

customer_reviews.title: Decluttering!
customer_reviews.text: I got this to free the paper clutter of my life! The Konmari method by Marie Kondo really hit home so I got a scanner that can scan double sided pages into a digital platform to toss papers that are relatively important! It moves nicely and you can change the settings to do long receipts. Works up to 10" of width of paper. Do not expect this to be very fast as it is good for small jobs. But it does get the job done!!
customer_reviews.author: KarateKids916

customer_reviews.title: Won't Work with MacBook
customer_reviews.text: Mac owners beware!! It would not work consistently with my MacBook. I installed everything multiple times and each time I got a message that said the scanner could not be found. I got it to work for about 20 minutes after fighting with it for about 5 hours. It worked with an old Lenovo laptop of mine and the scans looked clear and great overall on my Lenovo and when it briefly worked with my Mac.
customer_reviews.author: Paige

customer_reviews.title: Not for modern secure users
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely driven by old software. You cannot even pick a folder in windows 10. I hate to say it, but the 620 I had in windows 7 was great. They haven't updated the software. I would look other places if you want a ease to use device. This one is a usb drive/firmware/software device. A lot of secure companies will not let the software in the pcs\ All honesty.
customer_reviews.author: "cgiefing"

customer_reviews.title: There was no user manual with the scanner.
customer_reviews.text: I had to find a user manual on-line to determine how to archive the documents scanned. The scanning works quickly and well but was not useful until I searched to find out how to save and retrieve the documents. At least for me, it was not intuitive. Also, it appears that you can scan anywhere but you need WiFi to save the documents scanned, so usefulness is limited to areas where you would find an internet connection.
customer_reviews.author: Paula

customer_reviews.title: The scanner has worked great for me
customer_reviews.text: The scanner has worked great for me. It scans photos and documents quickly, which is what I wanted. It has multiple image formats and also has the ability to scan multiple documents into one PDF. I used this to scan my photo albums from my childhood years. I did not want to spend weeks on the project and this scanner was the perfect choice. It has descent photo scanning quality; however, it is not great. If you want the photo scan to be as good as the original, this is not the scanner for you. If you are looking for a quick scanner that has an average output quality, then this is the scanner for you.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great if you don’t mind slightly crooked scans.
customer_reviews.text: This works great for a simple, portable scanner. The only thing I don’t like about it is that sometimes I have to rescan a page several times when trying to get it through the scanner straight. It would have been great if it came with detachable paper guides that go out far enough to help you feed the paper through the scanner straight. But other than that, it works great and is relatively easy to setup and easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Cooper

customer_reviews.title: Better than expected.
customer_reviews.text: I needed a portable scanner to use short-term while our home office was being remodeled. To be honest, I’m not a big fan of Brother products in general as I’ve had a few die prematurely. However, due to limited options I purchased this anyways. To be honest, it works much better than I expected. I am NOT using the related software but even still, it was very easy to set up and use. The fact it does duplex scanning is a boon.
customer_reviews.author: KittyTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Works great for what I need.
customer_reviews.text: This works great for what I need. I work at home and occasionally have a document that I have questions about. Previously I had taken pictures with my smart phone to send but the clarity wasn't great. This device allows me to scan in color (for highlighted items) to a PDF document which I can then upload to my remote desktop with perfect clarity. The size allows me to store the scanner when I don't needed it, which is most of the time. I am totally satisfied with this product.
customer_reviews.author: Hannah Avarraschild

customer_reviews.title: Great product for the price! buy it and trash all your paperwork
customer_reviews.text: Thank you Brother for helping me get ride of ALL my bills, receipts, letters, etc. Unlike the old 620, this one does double sided scanning, in color, and comes with the receipt software (note that the receipt software included is a worthless program that takes more time to input the info than do it manually) but hey, its free. Great product, now everyone in the family wants one since I don't want to share it....LOL
customer_reviews.author: Suede19

customer_reviews.title: NOT for photos
customer_reviews.text: I bought this scanner specifically to digitize old photos. IT DOES NOT WORK FOR THIS. I tried every configuration of settings I could to make the photos look good. The colored photos look like cartoons, the B/W photos have no It just doesn't do the job. This scanner is better suited for business applications, i.e., documents/receipts.
customer_reviews.author: lprp8

customer_reviews.title: Worth it!
customer_reviews.text: Works great, even photos come out sharp even old Polaroid's. Receipts can only be so long but that's ok I just fold long ones in half and do a duplex scan. Best bang for my buck.
customer_reviews.author: Kovacs House

customer_reviews.title: Incompatibility with receipt filing software
customer_reviews.text: Scanner worked fine but the receipt software(which comes from a 3rd party) COULD NOT CONNECT from computer to scanner. I spent 2 hours on the phone with tech support and they couldn't make it work. The compatibility of the filing software and your computer is critical. I returned the scanner. Using a Mac.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice but...
customer_reviews.text: Wife really likes this but, two things made it lose a star. Price was a tad higher than what it should be and the defaults of the software are complicated and hard to find scan in Windows 10. Yes, it auto scans and dumps to JPG. Wife wanted PDF. Opening program gave her that. Location didn't match either but, once you figure it out, it's nice enough. Duplex is a great plus. Remember, this scanner is for SINGLE PAGE (front and back if needed). No staples etc.. or you WILL damage it.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!!!
customer_reviews.text: I am soo unbelievably happy with this little thing. I’ve found that I scan everything I can, just because I can. Perfect size to travel and not at all heavy. I can scan multiple documents into a single file (which was important for me when used for work). I’ve had it about a year and haven’t had any issues with it.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: ... scan save some handwritten school documents and am very glad I did
customer_reviews.text: I got this to scan save some handwritten school documents and am very glad I did. It's a lot better than using my phone to take pictures and converting them to pdf. It's really easy to use and also very easy to change the settings to make your scans look better (like if you are scanning a document on colored paper). You don't have to install all the software that comes with it to use it effectively, either, but the option is there. I also like how little desk real estate this takes up since I tend to be make a cluttered mess of my work space.
customer_reviews.author: Renee

customer_reviews.title: DS-720D won't work with MacBook Pro 2019
customer_reviews.text: I got only one year out of this product. It worked fine with my 2015 MacBook Pro, but does NOT with the 2019. Spent hours on the phone with Brother and Apple. Would have been great to get a clear answer at the start. Level 5 tech at Brother finally told me it won't work. Brother did not offer any discounts or coupons for a new scanner.
customer_reviews.author: Ken S.

customer_reviews.title: It is easy to set up.  The software is kind of clunky.  It works well (except for one thing).  It takes up very little desk spac
customer_reviews.text: It is easy to set up. The software is kind of clunky. It works well (except for one thing). It takes up very little desk space. I bought a duplex scanner because I hoped that it would be able to scan both sides of an insurance card and place both images into a single file (for our EHR). (It will scan both sides simultaneously - but puts each side into separate files. So far it doesn't. I contacted tech support, and the guy in charge of the product told me that he thought that it did. He tried it and agreed. He promised to get back to me and that was about a month ago.
customer_reviews.author: F1

customer_reviews.title: Not has good as expected
customer_reviews.text: I had high hopes for this scanner based on the review. It does scan both sides of a paper, but the software does not combine multiple pages into one PDF. I have to use other software to do that. The scanner worked on one of my computers but would not on the other one. I was disappointed to find that they only offered email and chat support.
customer_reviews.author: Diane

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Scanner i give it a 100%
customer_reviews.text: At first i almost return it, i didn’t realized the original settings come in black and white with a very low resolution on the settings, but when we changed it to color and increased the resolution, oh my god! We slide a license and it came out way better than the license itself, jesus crist what a scanner!! Feel like buying another one!! Very pleased, this scanner will take care of business! No more trips to staples to waste money fuel and time. Recomended!! Excellent Scanner, i give it 100%. Very happy!
customer_reviews.author: Jet

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use!!!
customer_reviews.text: I wrote a review for the Scansnap saying how hard it was to use. This Brother scanner was super easy to install and use!!!! Very straight forward with no fancy terminology in the directions. Simply choose the folder to scan to, scan the receipt or document and there it ends up. It does very long receipts if I choose the paper option. The receipt shows up on a black background. Probably a way to fix that but not concerned about it. It's quieter than the Scansnap as well.
customer_reviews.author: P. Dunn

customer_reviews.title: Great little scanner. A must have for your Apple products.
customer_reviews.text: I had to purchase an Air printer for all my Apple products & the Epson printer scanner is a joke. So I took a chance & purchased this. I use it constantly. Very little setup required, incredible easy to use, software included makes everything easy and in it's place. Has a separate cover to carrying or keeping dust free. Best purchase ever. Too bad Air Printers have yet to manufacture items that do what they are advertising to do. This All-in -one advertising is a joke don't mess around. Buy this very small but east to use scanner. I've not been sorry. The ease of use and software included makes life so much simpler.
customer_reviews.author: Deborah

customer_reviews.title: Too much of a hastle
customer_reviews.text: I was so excited for this purchase to make my life easier and clean up my desk space, but it has done the opposite. The software is outdated and frustrating to use. It's difficult to combine pages into one document as they scan. If something messes up you have to start completely over. That doesn't sound too bad until it messes up your 100 page document. Wish I had spent my money elsewhere!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Hallelujah - Finally getting rid of paperwork
customer_reviews.text: It might be small, but this little scanner is quick and simple to use. Set up was super easy. You can scan both sides of the document and different sizes of papers too. It's footprint is small so it does not take up much room at all. I use this scanner alongside software called Paperport so now I do not have to keep copious amounts of paperwork. I scan it, file it, shred it..... perfect
customer_reviews.author: Mirry

customer_reviews.title: Great scanner at a good price and stores away easily
customer_reviews.text: I love this scanner. It scans double sided and is small enough to keep in a desk drawer when you are not using it. It scans multiple page (feeding one at a time). My only complaint is that the supporting software is very simple. It does not have the ability to combine pages into on scanned document, so when you scan a 10 page document, you end up with 10 separate images that have to be combined in a different software.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa S.

customer_reviews.title: Great scanner/terrible software, but better software available online (see review)
customer_reviews.text: Great device and works great and only uses USB for communication and power. I just bought a second one for work. Easy to use. Only wish the software was a little more sophisticated. Open Source software is available that is MUCH better from SourceForge. NAPS2 (Not Another PDF Scanner 2). I love it and will scan BW, duplex, color, etc.
customer_reviews.author: Tony M.

customer_reviews.title: Does not work natively on Mac
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately since this scanner does not support ICA/WIA, it does not work natively on Mac OS X. You have to use their own custom software for scanning, and honestly it's a crappy software ported from Windows to Mac, looks ugly and works ugly. Besides that, it works nice and has a good image quality and fast scan speed. I just hope they included this information on the page so that I wouldn't buy it and return it.
customer_reviews.author: Abbas Naderi

customer_reviews.title: Great choice for a portable scanner
customer_reviews.text: I have a business that I need to be able to scan documents when I am mobile. I looked at a number of options and settled on ordering this one. I liked the ability to scan duplex as a lot of my documents at two sided. It is a perfect size to fit in my laptop bag. The speed is not bad and it is super easy to use. Set up was very easy as well.
customer_reviews.author: Shenae

customer_reviews.title: This one has been reliable and came with all of the software you could want.
customer_reviews.text: I use it for school. We submit all work online and this makes life way easier. I got software for receipts and business cards with this one so I tried every program. They all work really well and I have no complaints. It works every time and I can save my scans in whatever format I wish. I use PDF but JPG and the other photo formats are available.
customer_reviews.author: Dustan W. Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Works very well, but image quality can change after prolonged use
customer_reviews.text: I use this to scan old envelopes with colored pictures on them. After a couple hours of continuous use, the images sometimes get too contrasty and harsh. I stop and resume the next day and all is fine. But it's so convenient, I will continue to use it.
customer_reviews.author: Jon

customer_reviews.title: Best Portable Scanner
customer_reviews.text: This is a true gem for the money. It works great & even scans in color. The scans are picture perfect not blurry as some I have used. It is compact & even comes with a case. I do not carry mine from location to location, but because of its compact size, you absolutely could do it. It also scans several pages into one document which I love.
customer_reviews.author: campinglover

customer_reviews.title: Worth It
customer_reviews.text: Once I figured out how to use this, this is been the easiest scanner I have ever had. It makes my life 100 times easier.
customer_reviews.author: Pinks

customer_reviews.title: Works very well
customer_reviews.text: Bought to replace my worn out Epson scanner. Is much faster. Scans both sides at once very clearly which saves a great deal of time as well. Software is easy to install and use. Would purchase again if it lasts.
customer_reviews.author: Ilan S.

customer_reviews.title: very good item to scan your receipts and documents to the ...
customer_reviews.text: very good item to scan your receipts and documents to the computer and keep yourself digital and not lose all those important tax documents Recently I found out thsat the item has an issue with it's USB port... the company is a bit difficult to talk to and get a resolution, so purchasing this item make sure all ports fit the wires correctly.
customer_reviews.author: Buzgal

customer_reviews.title: Way better than Neat desk
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the neat desk version before this one and it didn’t work well with Mac after iOS was updated. I waited months to get a Neat update that would work with my Mac. It never happened. So I bought this and it’s so much better. Love the software. It’s so much easier to use than Neat
customer_reviews.author: Amber

customer_reviews.title: Great scanner
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to go digital in my office. I use it to scan receipts and reduce the amount of paper that needs to be filed. It took a little bit to figure it out but I use it often and it has simplified my bookkeeping. Much faster than a flat bed scanner.
customer_reviews.author: Ekayem

customer_reviews.title: Did the job!
customer_reviews.text: I like it! It's compact but works efficiently and produces great scans. Lite weight and portable so you can fit in a larger laptop case if using on the go. I'm sure you will find more technical reviews if that's what you want, but if you want an honest opinion of daily use this is it. Great Product!
customer_reviews.author: peterg

customer_reviews.title: Inadequate software
customer_reviews.text: The scanner is handy and I like how it lets me feed receipt after receipt. Unfortunately, the software does not have any image processing such that scanned pages are huge and still poor quality.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Broooothhher!
customer_reviews.text: Tried to install software - it wouldn't - partially installed - won't run - can't uninstall - scanner kind of useless if you can't open the software. On the other hand, scanner looked nice, well built and was very disappointed to have to return it.
customer_reviews.author: S. Derickson

customer_reviews.title: BAD
customer_reviews.text: ONLY 2 MONTHS AND QUIET WORKING...AND NOW THEY SAY NO RETURN???? WHY?? THIS IS NOT RIGHT...WILL NOT BUY AGAIN.... BAD PRODUCT
customer_reviews.author: dacdistributing

customer_reviews.title: Bad Software
customer_reviews.text: No scanner is any better that the software provided. The software provided with this scanner is terrible. 4 Programs are provided and only one is duplex capable. The duplex program appears to be very old maybe even from the 1990s. Quite simply it doesn't work work a darn. I do not recommend this product or Brother as their support is also terrible.
customer_reviews.author: Al Dittman

customer_reviews.title: This thing is awesome.
customer_reviews.text: Super easy to set up and use. Easy to take with you but inexpensive enough to have a second one. I bought it for my branch office and I just bought a second one for home.
customer_reviews.author: JCS

customer_reviews.title: Does The Job
customer_reviews.text: Does the job and gets documents into PDF, good quality. Small to store away, needs no plug in, only to the USB to power it. It has scanned so far several hundred pages for me into PDF. Worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Verified Customer √

customer_reviews.title: Simple and fulfills my needs.
customer_reviews.text: That scanner works great for what I need and I got it during a special so the price was great. It's very lightweight and I love that it is powered by USB, that means I don't need to carry an additional power adapter when I'm out of the office and need to scan a document. The BR-Receipt software is convenient for me to get all my receipts in and I can place them into different folders to separate personal and business expenses. Now I have less clutter in my desk and file cabinets!
customer_reviews.author: Mina Poon

customer_reviews.title: Garbage.
customer_reviews.text: Jams constantly no matter how careful you are inserting the sheet. Interface is awkward to use. USB connector is too loose and easily disconnects from the advice, usually in the middle of scanning something. Poorly built. Only thing it does well is hold my garbage can down. Not worth half the price.
customer_reviews.author: MAK

customer_reviews.title: Wish it had a multi feeder but overall great.
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Using to clean up my home office paperwork and it works great for that. It’s tidious to insert one page at a time but for the price and the quality the extra work was worth my purchase. The programs it comes with are really helpful and it didn’t take long to get it started.
customer_reviews.author: Ninny

customer_reviews.title: software
customer_reviews.text: I don't like having to learn new software. I'm finally getting it now. It does scan well but it takes more steps than my old Brother scanner. It does a lot more though.
customer_reviews.author: Chief

customer_reviews.title: Worked once and then never again
customer_reviews.text: This thing worked fine the first time I used it. But after that it sucks. It won't do multiple documents and keeps saving file as last file intead of the new name I input. The buttons at at the top of the program seem to be missing. Can't find any help on line to tell me what I'm doing wrong. I am using the mac driver that I downloaded from Brother. Never buying brother again.
customer_reviews.author: Jeannette L Cochran

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for small business
customer_reviews.text: This scanner is perfect for my small business. Scans come out perfect, it is compact and does not take a lot of room, and can be set up to save scans to a folder so they are easy to find when you need them.
customer_reviews.author: Resolutions

customer_reviews.title: Bad scanner. Won’t set up.
customer_reviews.text: I have owned many scanners over the years and never had any trouble setting up any of them until now. I don’t know if it is software or scanner but I can’t get this thing to work. I’m using a MacPro laptop with iOS 10.13 level but nothing. Waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Shubs

customer_reviews.title: Great scanner....Get a Brother
customer_reviews.text: I have a Mac, and the Brother equipment is simply amazing with Mac and Apple. This scanner is simple and easy to use....just make sure it enters straight. I had an Ireceipt and this machine works better and clearer picture
customer_reviews.author: M. Sweeney

customer_reviews.title: Convenient
customer_reviews.text: I work from home and travel, the scanner is lightweight, and will fit in my backpack when traveling. It's easy to use and the scans are very clear. Perfect for what I need
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Wood

customer_reviews.title: Very easy to set-up and use
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to set-up and use. I didn't need one more large device taking up space and this was the perfect solution. It even comes with it's own little storage pouch. I love that you can continuously feed documents fairly quickly. I highly recommend installing the Paper Port software that comes with it to easily scan your documents directly into Microsoft word format - no extra steps needed (except opening the file and using "Save as" to name it and place it in the file folder of your choice).
customer_reviews.author: Linda Goldberg

customer_reviews.title: Pleasantly Surprised!
customer_reviews.text: Great quality, compact in size, very easy to set up and the color scan jobs are better than the black and white in my opinion. If you're on the fence, this is definitely a muat-have in your office or at home.
customer_reviews.author: Shanta

customer_reviews.title: Excellent and highly recommended
customer_reviews.text: I love this little scanner. I took it with my on my travels, and it works great because it receives its power from a USB cable, so I don't need an adapter. I mostly use it to scan postcards that I send and receive. I have also used it to scan documents. It works well for single sided and duplex, black and white or color. I completely recommend this portable scanner. It works great with my macbook.
customer_reviews.author: NTreader

customer_reviews.title: Working well.
customer_reviews.text: It works fine for what I need. I have regular video cameras but this is compact, light and is good for outdoor captures. Haven't tried the waterproof case yet.
customer_reviews.author: Dan E. Schultheis

customer_reviews.title: Very nice scanner
customer_reviews.text: Kinda difficult to setup on Linux but once setup it works great. Good picture quality, quiet and fast. I love the duplex scan.
customer_reviews.author: RustyJD

customer_reviews.title: Nice little scanner
customer_reviews.text: We have a large mobile workforce so scanning is done all the time. Some pages are too large for scanning software on a cell phone so these work great. Easy to install and our staff love them.
customer_reviews.author: ReneeD

customer_reviews.title: small, functional, lightweight
customer_reviews.text: Loving this scanner. Just got it today and took it with me. I have to feed one page at a time, but it is so lightweight and the image quality is excellent. I love it. It's small and barely takes up any space in my laptop bag. I'm super portable now.
customer_reviews.author: aukalou

customer_reviews.title: It broke within a month
customer_reviews.text: When it worked it was great. Broke within a month and was no longer under warranty. Don’t waste your money.
customer_reviews.author: CrissyCru

customer_reviews.title: Good size and portablility
customer_reviews.text: Good scanner. Bought the case with it. Together they are easy to travel and organize. Driver installation is a cinch, and duplex scanning works as expected. Another great product from Brother.
customer_reviews.author: P.C. NYC

customer_reviews.title: This is sturdy yet portable
customer_reviews.text: This is sturdy yet portable. Probably will need hard case to travel safely and it would be great if it was wireless. The feed is a little sensitive so if you wait too much for inserting the second page of a multipage document, it will make two separate images, which then you need to merge later in Adobe etc. Otherwise great!
customer_reviews.author: Phonograph Films LLC

customer_reviews.title: Products should not be sold with the expectation that tech support will be called.
customer_reviews.text: The scanner arrived with the inability to stay connected with several USB ports. There is no indication on the product that alerts you when it is warming up and when it is ready for use.
customer_reviews.author: 092312ftc

customer_reviews.title: Easy set up and works great with Brothers mHLL8260CDW.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to work with Brother Printer HLL8260CDW Business Color Laser Printer. Set up is straight forward and easy. The combo works well and it sits on top of the printer. Use double side tape to keep it in place.
customer_reviews.author: Bear Creek

customer_reviews.title: Does a great job of scanning both sides on pages
customer_reviews.text: Does a great job of scanning both sides on pages. The only problem I've encountered is scanning small items which the drive wheels don't like to keep square when running through the unit.
customer_reviews.author: Dont Need Cable

customer_reviews.title: Excellent scanner!
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I needed: quality, multipage, duplex, color scanning in a small, portable size. I love that it's powered by the USB connection to my laptop: no extra cords or outlets to look for on the go. Quality scans. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: LRC5555

customer_reviews.title: Great with Older Computers
customer_reviews.text: Been using this scanner since June 2018. Bought a new computer (Mac OS 10.15 Catalina) and the scanner no longer works. I have tried all steps laid out on the Brother website to troubleshoot.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Swiss

customer_reviews.title: Scanner is great but its software sucks
customer_reviews.text: It is small, portable and very easy to use. But its software is terrible. You cannot edit anything. You cannot make text sharper, descreen, remove gray background, etc. It doesn't align the scanned image either. E.g. if I put the page a little angled (happens very often) I end up with black spaces at the edges. I would expect it to detect that and align/rotate the scanned image properly.
customer_reviews.author: enginxxxx

customer_reviews.title: Easy set up
customer_reviews.text: Had it installed on windows 10 laptop in under 5 minutes. First scan was perfect with no modifications to settings other than I changed to pdf from jpg.
customer_reviews.author: rodisi

customer_reviews.title: efficient double-sided scan
customer_reviews.text: Haven't yet used it very much, but tried it out several times and like the way it scans both sides of the page with little effort on my part.
customer_reviews.author: Ziji

customer_reviews.title: It's Just Okay...
customer_reviews.text: I keep my records digitally. This scanner works fine for most things. I like that you can save a multi-page PDF; however, the description states "It can capture two-sided business documents..." Unfortunately, I found there were no settings for this. My daughter (tech savvy) and I worked for hours trying to capture a two-sided document. There are two scanning lights (top and bottom), but we could not find any settings to accomplish the two-sided scan. After about 30 minutes it becomes hot and slows greatly.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra Darst

customer_reviews.title: Convenient and Mobile
customer_reviews.text: Nice little scanner. Bought it because sometimes taking pictures with a camera just doesn't align correctly. Loved that it worked with Linux.
customer_reviews.author: MommaShea

customer_reviews.title: Great little Scanner
customer_reviews.text: I like automatic scanners. I had an old Paperport that was great. This scanner is just terrific! I easily scanned 85 pages of notes into it. All you have to do for OCR is drag the doc to the Word or Excel icon. Definitely helpful to reduce paper overload :)
customer_reviews.author: TK

customer_reviews.title: Major problems with Tech Support on the Receipt Software
customer_reviews.text: I am very pleased with the actual scanner product. The problem I had was with the specific receipt software, which is why I bought this item to begin with. It took many tech calls until I finally reached a technician that actually worked hard to get the software problem resolved.
customer_reviews.author: Karen Wheway

customer_reviews.title: I love this thing
customer_reviews.text: This scanner works perfectly for me in my business. It's extremely portable and the software, although a bit outdated and simple, works perfectly on my MacBook Air running OSX 10.10.3. It's fast and does a great job with both ID's/insurance cards and regular documents. It's definitely made the process of scanning much easier and convenient!
customer_reviews.author: Doug Shimmel

customer_reviews.title: This is great. I've done old dittoed fanzines
customer_reviews.text: The duplex scanning is key for me. Hand feeding is slower than an automatic stack-feeder, but also much cheaper. And hand feeding is much safer for paper that is old, wrinkled, folded, perhaps a little fragile. This is great. I've done old dittoed fanzines, and handwritten letters (on old folded paper), as well as nice clean flat modern documents.
customer_reviews.author: David Dyer-Bennet

customer_reviews.title: Returned
customer_reviews.text: I need one that can scan two sides of each sheet without having to manually do it.
customer_reviews.author: NMIMOM

customer_reviews.title: Great little scanner
customer_reviews.text: Great little scanner. Works flawlessly. I can even coax credit cards through with a little help. Running on Mac OSX High Sierra.
customer_reviews.author: Max Credits

customer_reviews.title: Definitely Recommend
customer_reviews.text: Love it..worked out of the box, feeds smoothly and straight... resolution is spot on.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works good for the small amount of scanning that we do
customer_reviews.text: Works good for the small amount of scanning that we do. Wish it would be able to save scans together. Example: Scanning a newsletter, scanned as individual pages instead of as an entire report. They are saved as individual PDF files for each page, not the entire report.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Scanner is easy to connect, use and has excellent quality scans. Compact size is nice.
customer_reviews.author: Richard S.

customer_reviews.title: Almost a 5 star!!
customer_reviews.text: I like the speed and the easy setup. The only reason I didnt give this a 5 star is because it doesnt pick up thin or really thick paper sizes, only regular paper.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Brother software is terrible, document feed is terrible
customer_reviews.text: This is 2020, the software for a scanner should be plug and play, but it's not. Document feeder if very touchy. You have to get it aligned perfectly or you get crooked documents. Good luck scanning a multi page document. Don't cheap out, get a multi-function printer with scanner.
customer_reviews.author: Jordan Holt

product_meta.title: Brother DS-720D Mobile Color Page Scanner, White (DS720D)
product_meta.description:
BROTHER DS MOBILE 720D SCANNER
LIGHTWEIGHT MOBILE DUPLEX SCANNER IS IDEAL FOR QUICKLY CAPTURING DOCUMENTS, RECEIPTS OR CARDS AND PROVIDES A VARIETY OF SCAN-TO DESTINATIONS.
The Brother DSMobile 720D Scanner, at just under 11.5” long and weighing just over 1 lb., is perfect for the mobile professional who needs a powerful scanner that will slide right into a briefcase or business bag. It’s ideal for capturing two-sided business documents, as well as receipts, business cards, laminated identification cards, invoices, photographs, and more. It scans at up to 1200 x 1200 dpi resolution (interpolated) and 600 x 600 dpi (optical), with fast color and black scan speeds of up to 8ppm, 5ppm duplex1. Its small size, USB power, and valuable suite of scanning software make it a great fit for home offices and desks with limited space, too!

SCAN TO A VARIETY OF LOCAL OR SHARED DESTINATIONS.
The DS-720D gives you the option to scan to a number of different destinations to help you manage your documents and workflow. Using the included scanning software, you can scan documents to a local file or image, to a shared folder, email, FTP, or printer, making it easy to save, distribute, and share information2.

BUNDLED WITH A VALUABLE SUITE OF SCANNING SOFTWARE TO ASSIST WITH ORGANIZING YOUR DOCUMENTS.
The DS-720D includes a valuable package of scanning software to help you manage and distribute information as well as reduce the need to store and reference hard copy documents:

Nuance PaperPort 12 SE (Windows) and Presto! PageManager 9 (Mac)

 * Manage all of your scanned documents, as well as the other documents on your computer
 * Scan to Microsoft Office formats, as well as Microsoft SharePoint (Windows only)
 * Scan, convert, organize, repurpose, and share PDF documents
 * Quickly merge multiple files of differing formats from various folders into one multi-page PDF
 * Scan to E-mail, Folder, OCR, and searchable PDF

Presto! BizCard (Windows/Mac)

 * Scan and export contact information from business cards directly to Microsoft Outlook and other contact management systems
 * Sort contacts by company group, category, and first or last name

Button Manager V2 (Windows) and DSmobileCapture (Windows/Mac)

 * Configure advanced scan settings for different scan-to destinations and store them for frequent use (ie: dpi resolution, file format, duplex scanning)

INCLUDES BR-RECEIPTS-QUICKEN AND QUICKBOOKS SOFTWARE COMPATIBLE RECEIPT MANAGEMENT SOFTWARE
The DS-720D includes BR-Receipts software that captures information from scanned receipts. BR-Receipts also lets you export your receipt data into Quicken and Quickbooks software to help simplify bookkeeping and reporting3.

BROTHER SCANNERS ARE COMPATIBLE WITH THE WAY YOU DO BUSINESS.
The DS-720D features industry-standard drivers, including TWAIN and SANE4, to help enable easy integration for scanning documents into a wide variety of popular applications. Plus, it’s compatible with Windows, Mac, and Linux operating systems!

BROTHER IS AT YOUR SIDE WITH OUTSTANDING CUSTOMER SUPPORT.
We offer a one-year limited warranty on the DS-720D and stand behind your purchase with phone support for the life of your product. Whether you have a product question or a technical issue, Brother is always at your side.

Size Paper documents, receipts, photos, recipes, business cards, 8.5" x 32" Paper documents, receipts, photos, business / plastic ID cards; 8.5" x 32" Paper documents, receipts, photos, business cards, plastic ID cards; 8.5" x 32" Paper documents, receipts, photos, business / plastic ID cards; 8.5" 34" Scan-to Destinations File, Image, E-mail, FTP, Shared Folder, Print File, Image, E-mail, FTP, Shared Folder, Print File, Image, E-mail, FTP, Shared Folder, SD card, Print, Apple & Android mobile devices E-mail, Image, OCR File, USB Flash Memory Drive6 & Android pohne or tablet7 WiFi Transfer / Web Connect N/A N/A WiFi Transfer Google Docs, Evernote, Dropbox, Box, OneDrive, Picasa Web Album, Flickr, Facebook Additional Features Searchable PDF Searchable PDF Rechargeable battery & 4GB SD Card Included, Searchable PDF TouchPanel, Card Scan Slot, Searchable PDF, Advanced Scanning Features (De-skew, Blank Page Skip, etc.) Software DSmobileScan II, Presto! PageManager 9, Presto! BizCard DSmobileScan ii, Presto! PageManager 9, Presto! Biz Card, BR-Receipts DSmobileScan ii, Presto! PageManager 9, Presto! Biz Card, BR-Receipts Nuance Paper Port, Presto! PageManager 9, Presto! BizCard & Control Center Drivers4 TWAIN / SANE TWAIN / SANE TWAIN / SANE TWAIN / WIA / ICA / ISIS / SANE OS Windows / Mac OS / Linux Windows / Mac OS / Linux Windows / Mac OS / Linux Windows / Mac OS / Linux 1. Color and monochrome scan speed, letter size paper at 300dpi. See www.brother-usa.com for details.
2. Scan-to options accessible via included Button Manager V2 software (Windows) or DSmobileCapture application (Mac & Windows). Scan-to e-mail, FTP, shared folder, and print options not supported by Mac OS. Scan-to OCR via included PaperPort (Windows) or PageManager (Mac) software.
3. BR-Receipts software available via download from Brother Online (only available in the USA).
Visit http://www.brothercloud.com/br-receipts for download details.
4. SANE driver available for download from Brother Solutions Center.
5. This device supports single sheet feeding. Please note that the numbers presented are for comparison purposes only and are intended to demonstrate what the device is capable of.
6. Additional purchase required, USB memory flash drive not included.
7. Requires Android cable supplied with phone or tablet.
feature_bullets: QUICK SCANNING: The Brother DS720D Mobile Color Page Scanner delivers lightning quick scanning at up to 8 ppm, and 5 ppm in duplex model (1)
MULTIPLE MEDIA HANDLING: Easily scan photos, documents, receipts, business cards, ID cards, and more, up to 8.5 inches wide × 32 inches long
COMPACT & LIGHTWEIGHT: The sleek new design measures 12inches in length and weighs less than 1 pound, making the DS 720D compact and effective
BUNDLED VERSATILE SOFTWARE SUITE: The DS 720D includes desktop document management, OCR, and business card management.Media Weights: Single Sheets (min/max):16 28

PRECISION SCANNING: The Brother DS 720D mobile color page scanner produces black & white and color scans up at up to 600 × 600 dpi resolution. Operating Environment: Temperature: 41 degree Fahrenheit 95 degree Fahrenheit (5 degree Celsius 35 degree Celsius); Operating Environment: Humidity: 15 percent 85 percent

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.2 out of 5 stars736 ratings4.2 out of 5 stars
